TopicTitle: SpaceX Dragon V2 Mission To The Mun.... Twice In One Mission

Articles.Content:
The title. Last night, I got the SpaceX Rockets parts package, and did some testing. They were good. So, I launched a Dragon V2 to the Mun. And I landed in a double crater. Got out, planted a flag, took some screenshots, and took off during an eclipse. I got out of the Mun's SOI, but after completing another Kerbin orbit, I was on a trajectory to have a polar impact on the Mun. So, I boosted my periapsis fro. 1.8km to 10km, and then slowed down when I was there. I tried landing, but when I landed, I slid too far, so just took off again. And returned to Kerbin orbit, for good this time. One more orbit, and I landed.
